Question
========
Suppose we wanted to test a hypothesis about the influence of X on Y as rigorously possible (want to make the probability as small as possible that we can reject the null hypothesis). In what way should we then test?

Answerlist
----------
* We test one-sided and use an alpha of 1%.
* We test one-sided and apply an alpha of 5%.
* We test two-sided and apply an alpha of 1%.
* We test two-sided and apply an alpha of 5%.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
